name: MHTOCSMMAmnioticFluidEmbolism
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Amniotic Fluid Embolism Indicator
description: A ValueSet comprised of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity Amniotic Fluid Embolism Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.

concept.display: Obstetrical pulmonary embolism, unspecified as to episode of care or not applicable
Obstetrical pulmonary embolism, delivered, with or without mention of antepartum condition
Obstetrical pulmonary embolism, delivered, with mention of postpartum complication
Obstetrical pulmonary embolism, antepartum condition or complication
Obstetrical pulmonary embolism, postpartum condition or complication
Amniotic fluid embolism in pregnancy, second trimester
Amniotic fluid embolism in pregnancy, third trimester
Amniotic fluid embolism in pregnancy, unspecified trimester
Amniotic fluid embolism in the puerperium
